title.rendered: Entrepreneurship and Building a Better World

content.rendered:
The Cambridge Society of Paris is launching a series of events, currently on Zoom, aimed at those who are involved – or just interested – in all aspects relating to being an Entrepreneur.

Led by Committee Member Nicolas Nouvel, a series of forums will be held in which a selected panel of Deep Tech entrepreneurs will have an opportunity promote their business, increase their visibility and potentially get some support towards success. By Deep Tech entrepreneurs we mean people who own some specific patent or know-how in Clean Technologies, hence they will have some innovative and inspirational ways of building a better world by driving the adoption of cleaner technologies in essential yet highly polluting industries.

The first event will take place at 6pm on Thursday 26th November, on Zoom, and is expected last about 90 minutes.

The first half will be a panel discussion, followed by Q&A in the second half.

Please sign up using the ticket application box below. The link to the Zoom meeting will be sent to registered participants a couple of days before the event.
